cyclone.name: JERRY
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northwest then expected to turn northeast toward Bermuda and the open North Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Bermuda (closest approach â€“ not an actual landfall)

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect (only Bermuda is under watch/warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Bermuda; long-period swells continue for the northern Leeward Islands and Puerto Rico
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; only occasional breezy conditions possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: Scattered light showers possible; heavy rainfall not anticipated.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and dangerous rip currents along exposed beaches.
